alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 9:40PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville affecting Pulaski and Bleckley Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 25 feet, Minor flooding occurs with some roads closed that provide access to residences. RiverView Road closes to residents. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EDT Monday the stage was 25.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 20 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
